extendedInfo.description: Tricky Brains , the Perfect application to Fool your friends !April Fool's Day is coming, Download this app , you will be the Tricky Brains !You can choose all applications in your system to create a fake shortcut on your desktop , You can choose twelve kinds of way to set a mischievous prank , The Cracked Screen , The Sound Grenade , The Screen Tricker , etc .See the surprise in your friends eyes when they are in your Tricky ! When it comes to pranks, nothing can be greater than making your family and friends feel guilty ! When they are in your Tricky , the only way chosen  to exit , disable your device's buttons, you'll have them panicking like crazy!How to use!1. Press the "SetFakes" button , Choose an app in your system to set as fake shortcut.2. Press the "SetTricky" button , Choose the effect of Tricky.3. Press the "SetQiutMode" button , Choose the way to exit Tricky.4. Press the "Create" button , Create a shortcut on desktop.Features:- Will Add DIY SetFake , Let you set whatever icon in your SD or Camera and use whatever name . - Will Add DIY SetTricky, Let you use whatever sound in SD or by recording .- Will Add more kinds of Sound Grenade .- Will add more kinds of mischievous prank.Related Keywords : April Fool's Day , Fools , prank , prankish , naughty , annoyingly playful , A harmless prank , A mischievous prank , An innocent prank , A mischievous trick , A practical joke , play a joke on , make jest .
